sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { number = Array(8).fill(0).map((x,i)=>i); ello =0; checkboard = [false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false]; checkbox(ello: number): void { this.ello = ello; } }
